Author: Bitney
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] 🐝 Bitney 🐝 - A Commodity-powered Blockchain Gameverse

Author: Bitney
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] 🐝 Bitney 🐝 - A Commodity-powered Blockchain Gameverse
Body: Thank you for your interest in our projects!  Our business model for sustainability of our currency is that we will channel revenue from our mobile games into our honey farms. And as the number of our honey farms grows (due to us investing game revenue into more farm expansion), we will use the profits from the honey farm to buy back bitney, as well as channel profits from the farm as rewards for players in our game world.  If you have any concerns, questions, or feedback we will be happy to answer you as best as we can.  In the meanwhile, we are happy to be on the right track as more gaming giants are shifting their focus to mobile platforms. The blockchain and game space is the right place for us to be!  For more games industry news, check out the link for the full article! https://www.gamesindustry.biz/articles/2018-11-09-blizzard-acknowledges-the-mobile-reality

Author: Bitney
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] 🐝 Bitney 🐝 - A Commodity-powered Blockchain Gameverse
Body: Thank you for your feedback.  It's not really a backing from the environment but rather a contribution from the honey farms in partnership with Beeznix the game. In return Bitney provides resources educational backing that bee farms require to prosper. Coupled with Beeznix Gameverse, it could prove to be a sustainable cycle with plenty of synergy in line with the company's vision and mission.  However, all plans are not perfect and always require iteration and innovation in line with developments around the world. As a team we are open to criticism and feedback to continue pushing boundaries and developing our product according to user's requirements. Success is what we strive for and we are determined to do it.

Author: BitneyOfficial
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] 🐝 Bitney 🐝 - A Commodity-powered Blockchain Gameverse
Body: BITNEY  Crypto Game Rewards Powered by Real Honey Farms. Play and earn game rewards with real world value!  Telegram Group |Telegram Announcement | BountyThread | Website | Twitter | Facebook| _______________________________________________________________________________ ___________________________________________________________  About Bitney Bitney is a company that is developing Beeznix the game. In conjuction with that, Bitney is partnering with many established, revenue gerating bee farms to help cultivate and educate beekeepers and businesses. Bitney has a Community Service Reserve (CSR) fund to help educate and promote beekeeping activities. We believe that the decline of bees is a serious problem and poses a huge risk to the future of earth. Bees are an irreplaceable force of nature, without which many plants and trees will fail to pollinate and subsequently be at risk of extinction. Through our CSR, bee farms and Beeznix the game we hope to promote and educate the world on the importance of bees and uptake our role as protectors of bees. With our different initiatives working together in synergy, we believe our token, business and game will be able to generate immense value and propagate our mission and vision to many more people. Together, we will be able to ensure that we will be able to partake in this incredible mission to save our little furry striped friends.  As a utility token, Bitney tokens are used to purchase in-game assets such as erc-721 cards, staked in tournaments and much more. Players are able to earn Bitney tokens through playing and winning the Beeznix games. Players are also able to "lose" their Bitney on the game platform if they are not careful. With cunning and skill players battle each other to gain an edge in Beeznix the Honeyverse. Beeznix as a game is a great marketing and fun effort to push out Bitney's mission. Profits from the sale of honey used to buyback Bitney tokens. From this buyback, 20% of the tokens are burned, and 80% is redeposited into the Beeznix Game Rewards Bank. Beeznix Game Rewards are used to incentivise and fund tournaments for the community. Problems & Solutions  1) Problem:An increasing global demand for honey and insufficient supply of raw honey.  Solution:Profits generated from a mobile game accelerates expansion of honey farms. A global outreach program will help educate farm owners and optimize hives and maximize honey outputs. Provenance of honey generated from project Beeznix can be tracked using a decentralized ledger to prevent bootlegging.  2) Problem: Many cryptocurrencies are at risk of eventual devaluation from lack of a sustainable revenue model.  Solution: Bitney is built off an established, revenue generating honey business.Profits from honey sales are used to purchase Bitney tokens from exchanges. From this buyback, 20% of the tokens are burned, and 80% is redeposited into the Beeznix Game Rewards Bank. This cycle safeguards Bitney’s value.  3) Problem: Limited playability and portability of game skins.  Solution: Bluepz utilizes the ERC720 token standard to create crypto game assets such as skins, gold and accessories that are transferrable between players, combinable with other game assets and usable across multiple games / game modes. Bluepz can also be sold for Bitney at our community market.  4) Problem: Undisclosed drop rates and proof of provenance for purchasable digital assets.  Solution: Using a viewable algorithm that always generates a randomized drop rate, our drops for ‘mystery’ assets are provably fair. Bluepz are recorded on a decentralized registry, and asset ownership trails can be viewed via the block explorer.  5) Problem: Lack of digital assets that can act as collateral for peer-to-peer microfinancing  Solution: Ruled by market demand and scarcity, each Bluep holds its own price and can act as a digital collateral for loans between players. Lenders choose to offer loans based on their perceived valuation of the offered collateral and decides on interest rates. Smart contracts execute terms for the movement of funds and the escrow of the collateral.  6) Problem: Players spend time, effort and money on games, but get no real-world rewards  Solution: The Beeznix game lets players earn Bitney rewards for playing and amassing in-game resources. Players can exchange Bitney for major cryptocurrencies at exchanges listing Bitney. The Beeznix Rewards Bank is funded by actual honey sales profits.  7) Problem: Gas fees and transaction times make ERC721 gaming directly on Ethereum unfeasible.  Solution: Beeznix operates on a sidechain, where the player’s preauthorized game wallet is subject to the game’s smart contract rules, allowing fast and free movement of ERC721 game assets and autonomous changes of ownership. This opens up a whole world of possibilities for development of more intricate gameplays involving non-fungible token assets (NFTs).  Token Metrics $32 million hardcap $5 million softcap 1 billion token supply ICO 50% of token supply, 500 million BTNY tokens Private sale stage 1 100m tokens  Closed Private sale stage 2 100m tokens  Open to institutional or accredited investors Pre-sale stage 1      100m tokens @ $0.064 Pre-sale stage 2      100m tokens @ $0.072 Public sale              100m @ $0.08 Unsold tokens are burned.  Distribution 50% ICO 10% Marketing 1% Bounty 4% Community Service Reserve 15% Strategic Partnerships 20% Company Reserve  Allocation of ICO Budget 40% Partnerships with Bee Farm 30% Marketing 2% Game Rewards Bank 10% Contingency Fund 18% Game Developments & Operations  Do join our telegram or post below if you have further questions to interact with the team and the community! Join here: https://t.me/bitneyofficial  For those interested in Bounty Rewards, head over here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4420704  Telegram Group |Telegram Announcement | Bounty Thread | Website | Twitter | Facebook|
